line_1: An urchin group in silent wonder gazing,
line_2: When round the potter's wheel, their chins raising,

line_1: And didst thou see, when thou wert gazing,
line_2: The shepherd turn them out a grazing?

line_1: At her casement she stands, o'er the waters she's gazing,
line_2: Even now perhaps, her dark hair raising,
